class.name: PhysicsTestMotionResult3D
class.brief_description: Describes the motion and collision result from [method PhysicsServer3D.body_test_motion].
class.description: Describes the motion and collision result from [method PhysicsServer3D.body_test_motion].

method.name: get_collider
method.description: Returns the colliding body's attached [Object] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collider_id
method.description: Returns the unique instance ID of the colliding body's attached [Object] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred. See [method Object.get_instance_id].

method.name: get_collider_rid
method.description: Returns the colliding body's [RID] used by the [PhysicsServer3D] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collider_shape
method.description: Returns the colliding body's shape index given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred. See [CollisionObject3D].

method.name: get_collider_velocity
method.description: Returns the colliding body's velocity given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collision_count
method.description: Returns the number of detected collisions.

method.name: get_collision_depth
method.description: Returns the length of overlap along the collision normal given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collision_local_shape
method.description: Returns the moving object's colliding shape given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collision_normal
method.description: Returns the colliding body's shape's normal at the point of collision given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collision_point
method.description: Returns the point of collision in global coordinates given a collision index (the deepest collision by default), if a collision occurred.

method.name: get_collision_safe_fraction
method.description: Returns the maximum fraction of the motion that can occur without a collision, between [code]0[/code] and [code]1[/code].

method.name: get_collision_unsafe_fraction
method.description: Returns the minimum fraction of the motion needed to collide, if a collision occurred, between [code]0[/code] and [code]1[/code].

method.name: get_remainder
method.description: Returns the moving object's remaining movement vector.

method.name: get_travel
method.description: Returns the moving object's travel before collision.
